meanings.definition: A river or stream that flows into a larger river or lake.
meanings.sent1: The small tributary joined the mighty river.
meanings.sent2: The tributary added to the volume of the main river.
meanings.sent3: The tributary brought a gift of water to the river.
meanings.sent4: The tributary humbly merged with the grand river.
meanings.sent5: The tributary was like a loyal servant to the river.

meanings.definition: Paying tribute or homage to a ruler or government.
meanings.sent1: The tribe showed their tributary respect to the king.
meanings.sent2: The tributary ceremony honored the ruler.
meanings.sent3: The tributary gesture pleased the government officials.
meanings.sent4: The tributary tribute was a sign of loyalty.
meanings.sent5: The tributary act was a mark of allegiance.
